member.name: THUMBBUTTONMASK
member.summary: Used by the structure to specify which members of that structure contain valid data.

member.name: THUMBBUTTONMASK.THB_BITMAP
member.summary: The iBitmap member contains valid information.

member.name: THUMBBUTTONMASK.THB_ICON
member.summary: The hIcon member contains valid information.

member.name: THUMBBUTTONMASK.THB_TOOLTIP
member.summary: The szTip member contains valid information.

member.name: THUMBBUTTONMASK.THB_FLAGS
member.summary: The dwFlags member contains valid information.
